Text:
Another great Nintendo Wii game torrent.
Thanks!

NOTE: This game is not recommended for people playing from DVD-R discs due to the problem with Wii's not being able to read DVD-R discs at fast enough speed in comparison to genuine original game discs.
Many games play fine from DVD-R however ''We Sing: Robbie Williams'' is one that does not.

PROBLEMS: running from disc this game is unable to play correctly as the song audio goes out of sync by delaying and the background videos freeze/stutter due to DVD-R slower read speeds.

----------------------------

PRELOADER VERSION: 0.27
LOADS BY: Loads straight into Disc Channel as normal but has issues with DVD-R read speed.

DrewKrew, United Kingdom
